2:00 » Doncaster

SAT 27 MAR 2010

William Hill Spring Mile (Handicap) (CLASS 2) (4yo+) Winner £31,155CH4
Soft 1m Number of runners: 22

Our expert's view of the main contenders and likely winner of the race. Part of RACINGPOST.com Members' Club

The Michael Dods pair The Osteopath and Kiwi Bay have to be respected on ground that suits but preference is for the lightly raced BEN CHORLEY, who has a proven record fresh and makes his debut for David Evans under ideal conditions.
